authorAttributions.displayName: Allergy Experts - New York Allergy & Asthma
Allergy Experts - New York Allergy & Asthma

adrFormatAddress: 1535 2nd Ave Ground Floor, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: Allergy experts provide outstanding customer service in patient care. From the moment I enter, both Karen and Leigh Anne are perceptive, efficient, and attentive to all patient needs. They also multitask seamlessly between live environment and telephone patients. My appointments run smoothly, and Dr Lighvani was very personable. The nurses are also very nice and create a comfortable atmosphere. Treatment options were clearly explained, and I have seen results.

text.text: Allergy experts provide outstanding customer service in patient care. From the moment I enter, both Karen and Leigh Anne are perceptive, efficient, and attentive to all patient needs. They also multitask seamlessly between live environment and telephone patients. My appointments run smoothly, and Dr Lighvani was very personable. The nurses are also very nice and create a comfortable atmosphere. Treatment options were clearly explained, and I have seen results.

originalText.text: I was referred to Allergy Experts by my Oncologist. From the moment I made the appointment to leaving the building, the entire experience was wonderful. I was greeted by a very friendly reception staff (shout out to Karen!). I came an hour early for my appointment from far away and they were very accommodating. I was willing to wait but they insisted on getting me seen early (thank you so much for that). During the appointment my tech/nurse was Taylor. She was so sweet, gentle and patient with me. Adrian and Garima were one of the other techs/nurses and they are totally awesome as well. I saw Dr. Plager and she was so attentive to my situation and showed great concern, we worked together to come up with a treatment plan and she even called me after the appointment to go over a few other things with me. I feel I'm in great hands with the wonderful Dr's and staff at Allergy Experts. Thank you!

originalText.text: Visited Dr. Plager. She showed me excellent quality of care, great follow up, how a doctor should be. She’s got a great bedside manner and really cares, the office team is amazing, Karen made sure I made my follow up appointment.

text.text: Visited Dr. Plager. She showed me excellent quality of care, great follow up, how a doctor should be. She’s got a great bedside manner and really cares, the office team is amazing, Karen made sure I made my follow up appointment.

originalText.text: An impeccably run medical office. From arrival to departure, nearly two hours of testing and diagnostic procedures. It all ran super smoothly with quietly competent professionals. Dr. Lighvani was very personable, providing detailed explanations of his tests, findings and diagnosis. Highly recommend this team for allergy issues.

Dr. Lighvani was very personable, providing detailed explanations of his tests, findings and diagnosis. Highly recommend this team for allergy issues.

originalText.text: Just amazing place. They always take care of you and make you feel good about going to the doctor. They tell you all your options and you together make a guided decision. The Doctors are very gentle and heal with a modern approach to medicine. They are up on all the new treatment trends. Pair them up with Capsule and they make a great team. A rare find of a doctor office. They will even see your toddler for allergy testing. Highly recommend.
